title: Shell Commands
content:
## Create a folder or directory

```shell
# This Command creates a folder
mkdir directoryname
```

## Rename a folder

```shell
# This Command creates a folder
mv oldname newname
```

# Deleting
#### Remove a file

```shell
# This Command removes a single file
rm filename
```

#### Delete a directory

```shell
# This Command deletes a folder
rm -r foldername
```



# Copying

#### Copy a directory
```shell
# This command copies a folder
cp -r currentfoldername newfoldername
```
